11222.content:
Killua left the building and went out. As it was a pleasantly sunny day, he decided to hang around the local park, planning to enjoy the fresh breeze there for a while. Also, there were definitely going to be a lot of people there and the thought of walking among them, while secretly wearing his kiddie briefs, made Killua shiver with excitement. And luckily nobody would've discovered it, so he was free to enjoy himself without a single worry! Or so he thought...

As he reached the park, Killua saw dozens of people hanging around there, much like himself.

Near the main entrance, there was a playground where a group of kids, slightly younger than him, was playing with their toys in the sandbox, chasing each other with water guns, screaming, and so on. Killua smirked at their silliness, finding their games rather childish, so he took out his yo-yo and performed a couple of tricks to impress them, while seemingly not paying the kids any attention.

Slightly ahead, Killua spotted a vending machine filled with fresh drinks, a nice little treat he was sure to enjoy. info.brief_description: An interactive story focusing on Killua in his humiliating adventure.
info.description:
Prepare killua for you now face a humiliating adventure, filled with wedgie diapers and all other forms of humiliation!

Rules:
1) this is a story for adults so minors be gone!
2) killua is the primary focus for this!
3) girls can be in the story but they cant be involed in any sexual behavior!
4) Killua will be interested in guys in this story!
5) make sure there multiple choice options!
6) be descriptive but dont force scenarios onto people when it could be branched off onto something else!
